STARVATION.Definition: the state of being incredibly hungry

DIVERGENT SERIES.Definition: In mathematics, a divergent series is an infinite series that is not convergent, meaning that the infinite sequence of the partial sums of the series does not have a finite limit.

PROOFS.Definition: tests in mathematics that show that a theory is correct

CASTE.Definition: the system of dividing Hindu society into different classes

SLATE.Definition: a dark grey rock that can be written on

SCHOLARSHIP.Definition: an amount of money given to someone to help pay for their education

FRAUD.Definition: someone who isn't what they say they are

THE REAL DEAL.Definition: someone who is very good and is who they say they are

EXPATS.Definition: people who do not live in their home country

TOOK IT UPON HIMSELF.Definition: decided to do something for himself

ASTOUNDING.Definition: so surprising that it's hard to believe

THEOREMS.Definition: in mathematics, a statement that can be shown to be true

BACK AND FORTH.Definition: the movement of things in both directions

INTUITION.Definition: knowing that something is true based on feelings, rather than proof

INSTINCTIVELY.Definition: knowing by feeling, rather than detailed thought

SET THE WHEELS IN MOTION.Definition: start the process of something happening

UNDERGRADUATE.Definition: the first degree at a college/university

POSTGRADUATE.Definition: a second degree at a college/university

PARASITE.Definition: an animal or plant that lives in another animal

DIAGNOSE.Definition: be able to say what the exact medical problem is

FELLOW.Definition: an important member of an official society

LEGACY.Definition: what is left after someone dies

POSTER BOY.Definition: an example to others of what is possible

DESPITE ALL THE ODDS.Definition: if something happens 'despite all the odds', it is very unlikely

SIDETRACKED.Definition: if you get sidetracked, you get distracted from what you were doing
